Title: Cuak
Director: Khairil M. Bahar, Benji Lim, Manesh Nesaratnam, Shamaine Othman, Tony Pietra
Writer: Khairil M. Bahar, Priya Kulasagaran, Benji Lim (story), Manesh Nesaratnam, Shamaine Othman, Tony Pietra, Magdelen Spooner
Actors: Corinne Adrienne, Ghafir Akbar, Abdul Qahar Aqilah, Bernie Chan
Plot: CUAK, which roughly translates to 'cold feet', follows the story of Adam on the verge of getting married and having second thoughts as he goes through the events that lead up to this moment...
